detailed_description:
💬Precautions&Frequently Asked Questions

Note: The trial version is the Steam release version corresponding to the ancient history version of RT_CrH. The main functions are basically installed. Some functions are different from the official version, and there may be some bugs.

The official version is nearing the end of development, and will support simplified Chinese and English. Please wait and see.

Is the crosshair not displaying?

-------

💡 Due to the exclusive use of graphics cards in full screen mode for some large games, the operation of Recoil_Track&Precise relies on the full screen/frameless window mode of some large games, while non large online games support full screen.

Due to the large number of games, users are advised to set the full screen/borderless window mode for related games on Baidu.

🔔 The author's computer suddenly supports full screen use, perhaps due to the right-click administrator running? If specific reasons are found, please contact the author or management!

Is the interface garbled?

-------

💡 Due to limitations in programming language and other aspects, Recoil_Tracker&Precise cannot support Unicode characters well. To solve the problem of garbled characters, it is necessary to modify the system language area settings.

  • Open the computer's Start menu [Win key] and open Settings in the bottom left corner.

  • Select "Time and Language" and choose the language on the left.

  • Click on "Manage Language Settings" in the "Related Settings" section on the right, and then click on "Change System Regional Settings" at the bottom of the pop-up window.

  • In the pop-up window, select Chinese (Simplified, China) from the drop-down menu under "Current System Regional Settings", and uncheck "Beta Version: Provides global language support using Unicode UTF-8" below.

Change resolution?

-------

💡 Due to the temporary inability to support full screen exclusivity, the steps required to change the game resolution in full screen window mode for Recoil_Tracker&Precise are slightly complicated. Please follow the steps below.

  • Preliminary settings (only need to be set once):

    • N-card user:

      • Open the NVIDIA Control Panel.

      • [Display] - [Adjust desktop size and position] Check [Full screen] and [Overwrite zoom mode set by game and program] and apply.

    • A-card user:

      • Open AMD Software.

      • [Display] - [Turn on GPU Zoom] - [Zoom Mode] Change to [Full Panel] and apply.

  • Program settings:

    • Fill in the desired resolution (i.e. game resolution) under [Auxiliary Settings] - [Resolution] - [Preset Resolution], and click [Apply].

    • After playing, you can click on [Restore] at the same location to restore the initial resolution.

Is the route too high/too low?

-------

💡 Attention: Recoil_Tracer V2.1.4.0 version already supports DPI adaptation, the following solutions can skip awa on their own!!

💡 Due to the fact that the measurement unit for trajectory is pixels, it is necessary to ensure that DPI is consistent with the game to display the trajectory normally.

Option 1:

  • Open the computer's Start menu [Win key] and open Settings in the bottom left corner.

  • Select "System" on the top left and "Display" on the left.

  • Find 'Change the size of text, applications, and other items' in the' Zoom and Layout 'section on the right, and scroll down to' 100% (recommended) '.

  • Restart the software.

Option 2:

  • Find the program file 'Recoil_Tracer. exe' or the shortcut 'Recoil_Tracer. lnk'.

  • Right click, select and open "Properties", choose "Compatibility", find and click on "Change High DPI Settings" below.

  • Find and check the selection box "Replace High DPI Scaling Behavior. Scaling Execution:" in the "High DPI Scaling Substitution" column below, drop down the group box, and select "Application".

Click the "OK" button below, and then click the "Apply" button below.

Restart the software.

💡 Due to the ballistic route unit being pixels, please synchronize the desktop resolution with the game resolution.

-------

🌟!! This paragraph is sourced from the official website. For more help, please go to the official website help center on the right or obtain it through contact information!! 🌟
